content: But sometimes we may flex up in terms of acquisitions and look to pay those back, flex it back down within the two years and certainly for us because we have a lot of low cost interest rates with hedges in place for the next six to seven years that along with opportunities in the capital market suggests that we still have ample room to continue to make acquisitions and we'll make acquisitions based upon the growth opportunities and the opportunities to improve our overall EBITDA margin and the growth in EBITDA for the total business.
